title: Hour 1: Snyder Striking Back?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Dan Orlovsky look ahead to the highly-anticipated rematch between the Bills and Chiefs and debate which star QB will be harder to stop: Mahomes or Allen? Damien Woody stops by to help preview the SNF matchup between the Eagles and Cowboys. The crew debates who needs to step up for the Cowboys the most to hand Philly their first loss of the season. The Giants may be 4-1, but Stephen A. thinks they aren't getting the respect they deserve. And, in a developing story this morning Commanders owner Dan Snyder has reportedly hired investigators to get "dirt" on other executives and claims he can "blow up" several league owners.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Dan Snyder claims to have "dirt" on NFL owners and executives in new story
